Contents: @everyone Hey everyone! We will be having another meeting today at lunch to discuss our plans for. Lunar New Years. We hope to see all of you there!
@everyone Hey everyone! We will be having our first meeting of the new semester today, at lunch, in room A101. We hope to see all of you there!

@everyone Hey everyone! The EASU will be having our next meeting tomorrow, November 15th, at lunch in A101. We will be discussing potential fundraiser ideas, and we will seek to solicit some suggestions from all of you. We look forward to seeing you all there!

@everyone Hey everyone! I hope you all had a great day off. We will be having our next meeting tomorrow during lunch in A101, and we will be going over Japanese Culture Day and some of the challenges that immigrants face. We hope to see you all there!

@everyone Hi Everyone! The East Asian Student Union will have its first meeting for the 2023 - 2024 school year tomorrow at lunch in A101. We will be doing a general introduction to our club, along with planning for a Mid - Autumn festival later this month. We hope to see you all there!
@everyone Club meeting is right now in L118!

@everyone Hi everyone! The next EASU Club Meeting will be held tomorrow (Friday, March 17th), at lunch, in L118 (Ms. Tanaka’s Room). We will be soliciting ideas for what to present at BMMS’ Multicultural Fair on Wednesday, April 6th. We hope to see all of you there!

@everyone Just a reminder that our next meeting is today at lunch in L118! We be discussing the history of Lunar New Years, talking about ASB’s plans for Monday at lunch, and eating dumplings. We hope to see all of you there!

@everyone Hi all! ASB is planning on hosting a Lunar New Year's Celebration on Monday, January 22nd and has asked our club if we'd be willing to come and help them set up this Friday, January 20th from 4 - 6 pm. For anyone interested in going, ASB has stated that they are offering to provide volunteer hours, so this is a great chance to get some community service hours in. If you are interested, please contact me directly to let me know!

Additionally, ASB has also asked for someone fluent in either Korean, Japanese, Cantonese, or Vietnamese to help emcee some lines for the festival in those languages, so don't hesitate to reach out if that's something you're interested in. 

Finally, our next club meeting will also be on Friday, January 20th, at lunch in L118 (Ms. Tanaka's room). We will be talking about various East Asian cultures, and hopefully watching something. If you want to recommend a movie/show for us to watch, please fill out the media suggestions section on the member feedback form.   

We hope to see you all at our next meeting!
@everyone remember to come to the club meeting today at lunch. We will be meeting in room L118

@everyone Hi everyone! For our next meeting (Friday, December 9th) we will be covering the zero - COVID protests currently going on in China. As such, we wanted to reach out to all of you to see whether or not any of you currently have family members being impacted by the policy/protests. If you do, and you would like to share their stories with us (and the club, if you want to), please fill out this form. Thank you! https://forms.gle/2NyHQW9K9mN38yZVA
@everyone remember to show up to our first meeting today at lunch in L118!
